description: API to retrieve the permissions from a user identity.

ID.description: The optional ID of the object to check permission for.
ID.title: ID

collectAccessibleNamespaces.description: If true, the property collectedAccssibleNamespaces will be filled with the list of allowed namespaces.
collectAccessibleNamespaces.title: collectAccessibleNamespaces

collectGroups.description: If true, the property collectedGroups will be filled with the list of groups used to resolve the permissions.
collectGroups.title: collectGroups

collectedAccessibleNamespaces.description: If collectAccessibleNamespaces is true, this property will contain the list of accessible namespaces.
collectedAccessibleNamespaces.title: collectedAccessibleNamespaces

collectedGroups.description: If collectGroups is true, this property will contain the list of groups used to resolve the permissions.
collectedGroups.title: collectedGroups

namespace.description: The namespace where to check permission from.
namespace.title: namespace

offloadPermissionsRestrictions.description: If true, skips computing restriction intersections.
offloadPermissionsRestrictions.title: offloadPermissionsRestrictions

restrictedNamespace.description: Sets the namespace restrictions that should apply.
restrictedNamespace.title: restrictedNamespace

restrictedNetworks.description: Sets the networks restrictions that should apply.
restrictedNetworks.title: restrictedNetworks

restrictedPermissions.description: Sets the permissions restrictions that should apply.
restrictedPermissions.title: restrictedPermissions

singleGroupMode.description: If true, only use the group with the higher weight to resolve policy resolution.
singleGroupMode.title: singleGroupMode

title: Permissions
